sentences.en: Don't shuffle your own responsibility onto others.
sentences.cn: 不要把你的责任推诿给他人.

sentences.en: Give the cards a good shuffle.
Give the pack a good shuffle.
sentences.cn: 把这副纸牌好好洗一下.

sentences.en: He decided not to look at the ground but just gaze straight ahead and shuffle along.
sentences.cn: 爽性不去管地上了,眼往平里看,脚擦着地走.

sentences.en: Herman began to shuffle the deck.
Is it my turn to shuffle?
On his desk was a shuffle of papers.
sentences.cn: 他的桌上放着混杂的文件.

sentences.en: She noticed her own proud walk had become a shuffle.
sentences.cn: 她意识到自己趾高气扬的步伐已变成了拖着脚走路了。

sentences.en: Shuffle and shamble indicate moving without lifting the feet completely off the ground.
sentences.cn: shuffle和shamble均指行走时脚不完全离开地面.

sentences.en: The Policeman continues to shuffle toward her.
sentences.cn: 警察还是慢慢地移步接近她.

sentences.en: There was a general shuffle and murmur of approval.
sentences.cn: 这群人发出一阵杂乱的移动脚步的声音,并低声表示着同意.

sentences.en: Why do you often shuffle when sitting?
sentences.cn: 你为什么坐着的时候要把脚在地上蹭来蹭去 呢 ?

sentences.en: You have to shuffle the cards before the cut for deal.
sentences.cn: 你得先洗牌,然后再倒牌和发牌.

words.tran_cn: 支吾的，曳步的；慢慢移动
洗牌，洗纸牌；混乱，蒙混；拖着脚走
洗牌；推诿，推卸；拖曳，慢吞吞地走；搅乱

phrases.phrase: be (或 get) lost in the shuffle
phrases.tran_cn: (北美， 非正式)在混乱中被忽略（或遗漏）

trans.tran_cn: 洗牌，混乱，蒙混，拖着脚走
trans.tran_en: a slow walk in which you do not lift your feet off the ground

trans.tran_cn: 洗牌 to produce a random order)； 拖步走； 支吾(to act or speak in an evasive manner)
trans.tran_en: to walk very slowly and noisily, without lifting your feet off the ground

trans.tran_cn: 拖着脚走； 洗； 蒙混； 搅乱
trans.tran_en: to walk very slowly and noisily, without lifting your feet off the ground

trans.tran_cn: 曳脚走，跳曳步舞，移动，推诿
洗牌，曳脚而行，搬移，搁置，随手放
